definition: right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
position/location/place/seat/classifier for people (honorific)/classifier for binary bits (e.g. 十六位 16-bit or 2 bytes)/(physics) potential

sentences.english: The Coda features the tune combined with an evocative countermelody in the piano.
sentences.chinese: 結尾部分的特徵在於結合了鋼琴的對位旋律。

sentences.english: Separate exposure box design, contrapuntal accurate.
sentences.chinese: 分離式曝光盒設計，對位精準。

sentences.english: If you put in other little strands of melody, it changes it more toward polyphonic texture.
sentences.chinese: 如果將之放到其他的小旋律中，將會改變對位材質。

sentences.english: During the last year of his life Schubert sought out a counterpoint teacher and took lessons.
sentences.chinese: 舒伯特在他有生最後一年找到一位對位法老師上課。

sentences.english: The development course is the interactional process of the contraposition of differentiation and integration.
sentences.chinese: 發展的過程是分化和整合之間對位性相互作用的過程。

sentences.english: A work free from, usually contrapuntal and in several sections.
sentences.chinese: 規格自由的作品，通常是分爲幾個部分的對位音樂。

sentences.english: Konchesky's opposite number on Sunday lunchtime will be Patrice Evra, a left-back he admires.
sentences.chinese: 週日和孔雀對位的將是他很欣賞的埃夫拉。

sentences.english: High clearance co-axial lens and CCD alignment system.
sentences.chinese: 配備高清晰同軸光學鏡頭和CCD對位系統裝置。

sentences.english: The methods of integrating sound and picture generally are synchronization and contraposition .
sentences.chinese: 聲畫組合的方法通常有聲畫同步和聲畫對位兩種。

sentences.english: In this paper, we introduce an automatic tube fill contraposition system.
sentences.chinese: 介紹一種用於軟管灌裝設備上的軟管自動對位系統。

sentences.english: Across the board, the match-up differences seem razor thin.
sentences.chinese: 根據這些來看，對位差距看起來跟剃鬚刀片一樣薄。

sentences.english: The composer is famous for his marvelous counterpoints.
sentences.chinese: 這位譜曲家以他傑出的對位旋律而聞名。
這麼看，對位問題依然存在。

sentences.english: Equiped with high clearance co-axial lens and CCD alignment system.
sentences.chinese: 配備高清晰同軸光學鏡頭和CCD對位系統裝置。
對象可以在像素級別上精確對位。

definition: to feel the pulse (TCM)/Taiwan pr. [zhen3 mo4]
